snippet: The police defused an improvised bomb found in a mall in an eastern suburb of Istanbul on Saturday, Turkey’s private Dogan news agency said.
abstract: Turkish police defuse bomb found in Istanbul mall.
lead_paragraph: The police defused an improvised bomb found in a mall in an eastern suburb of Istanbul on Saturday, Turkey’s private Dogan news agency said.

headline.main: Turkey: Police Defuse Bomb Found at an Istanbul Mall
headline.print_headline: Turkey: Police Defuse Bomb Found at an Istanbul Mall
